why.title: Why people switch to Chatforia
why.subtitle: Chatforia gives you a real phone number, smart translation, and a clear path to go ad-free when you’re ready.

textnow.title: Chatforia vs TextNow
textnow.body: Lighter ads on Free, a simple Plus upgrade when you’re ready, and Premium tools TextNow doesn’t offer.

voice.title: Chatforia vs Google Voice
voice.body: Modern app, global-first design, and built-in translation instead of old-school call forwarding.

messengers.title: Chatforia vs chat apps
messengers.body: Text real phone numbers — not just other app users — with AI and status built in. Great if you’re coming from apps like TextFree or TextMe.

why.disclaimer: Comparison based on publicly available information and may change over time. Other free-texting apps like TextFree or TextMe are generally similar to TextNow.

free.q: Is the Free plan really free?
free.a: Yes. The Free plan includes a Chatforia number, calling, and messaging with ads. You can stay on Free as long as you like, or upgrade to remove ads and unlock more features.

plusPremium.q: What’s the difference between Plus and Premium?
plusPremium.a: Plus removes ads and extends your message history — perfect for everyday use. Premium adds extra customization, AI tools for rewrites and replies, and priority support for heavy users.

esim.q: Where do eSIM data packs work?
esim.a: Chatforia Mobile uses global eSIM coverage. Availability depends on your country and device. You’ll see supported options during activation inside the app.

cancel.q: Can I cancel or change plans anytime?
cancel.a: Yes. You can manage or cancel your subscription from the billing page in the app. Changes take effect at the end of your current billing period.

family.a: Family packs create a shared data pool across multiple Chatforia accounts. One person pays the bill, and you can invite or remove members and set limits per person.

intro.body: This Privacy Policy explains how Chatforia (“we”, “us”) collects, uses, and shares information when you use our apps and services. We design Chatforia to minimize the data we can access.

infoWeCollect.title: Information we collect
infoWeCollect.account: Account info (e.g., email/phone) to create and secure your account.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Encrypted content (messages/calls) is end-to-end encrypted; we can’t read it.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Diagnostic/usage like crash logs, device type, or coarse analytics to improve performance.

sms.title: Mobile phone numbers and SMS
sms.body: If you choose to provide a mobile phone number, we use it to enable features such as account verification, login alerts, and user-to-user messaging via SMS where supported. We may send transactional SMS messages related to your account and activity on Chatforia. You can opt out of receiving SMS messages at any time by replying with a supported opt-out keyword (such as “STOP”) or by changing your notification preferences in the app. We do not sell your phone number or use it for unrelated marketing.

howWeUse.provide: Provide and secure the service (auth, spam/abuse detection).

sharing.title: Sharing
sharing.body: We don’t sell personal data. We may share limited data with processors (e.g., push notifications, analytics) under strict contracts.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.body: Depending on your region (e.g., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), you may request access, correction, deletion, or opt-out of certain processing. Contact: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Data retention & security
retention.body: We retain only what’s needed to operate the service and apply industry-standard security. E2E content can’t be decrypted by us.

children.title: Children
